amendment.description: To increase funding for the COPS Office Anti-Methamphetamine Task Forces grant program.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1150 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1150 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 948. (consideration: CR S6311; text: CR S6312-6313) To increase funding for the COPS Office Anti-Methamphetamine Task Forces grant program.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1150 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1150 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Gardner to Amendment SA 948.
